item.description:
Like our previous meetings: To help us get to know each other and facilitate discussion (with your permission, I will circulate a list of meeting attendees; with each person's

-brief bio
-areas of interest, training, or specialty
-links to past or current work (if viewable online

email me your info if you havn't already.
Thanks! and see you soon...and looking forward to meeting new members!
